feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
